data.eml:eml: Description of Meloidoderita salina sp. n. (Nematoda, Sphaeronematidae) from a micro-tidal salt marsh at Mont-Saint-Michel Bay in France

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Ashrafi, Samad, Mugniery, Didier, Heese, Evelyn YJ van, Aelst, Adriaan C. van, Helder, Johannes, Karssen, Gerrit (2012): Description of Meloidoderita salina sp. n. (Nematoda, Sphaeronematidae) from a micro-tidal salt marsh at Mont-Saint-Michel Bay in France. ZooKeys 249: 1-26, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.249.4138, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.249.4138
